pylayers.signal.bsignal.FUsignal.resample¶

FUsignal.resample(x_new, kind='linear')[source]¶

resample(self,x_new,kind=’linear’):

This function resample the Usignal with a new x base which needs to be strictly included in the original x base of the Usignal. x is a 1D array y is a 2D array
